Tutorial.TutorialText:
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY TEMPLATE ::: :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
EVENT ::: Denomination
HIDDEN ::: Yes/No
INFORMATION ::: Description
ORIGIN ::: Trigger (Chance)
REWARD ::: Treasure
SPECIAL ::: Other

Tutorial.Title: ::: EVENTS :::
Tutorial.TutorialText:
:::::::::::::::: ::: LIST ::: ::::::::::::::::
[SEASON] EVENT ::: [004] Channelers Internal Clock #X ::: [051] Drilling Progress I #X ::: [052] Eclipse I #X ::: [054] The world has changed I... #X ::: [055] Monster Crusaders I #X ::: [111] Drilling Progress II #X ::: [112] Eclipse II #X ::: [113] Monster Crusaders III #X ::: [114] The world has changed II... #X ::: [151] Tower Defense I #X ::: [181] Drilling Progress III #X ::: [182] Eclipse III #X ::: [183] Monster Crusaders III #X ::: [184] The world has changed III... #X ::: [261] Drilling Progress I #X ::: [262] Eclipse IV #X ::: [263] Monster Crusaders IV #X ::: [264] The world has changed IV... #X ::: [301] Tower Defense II #X ::: [354] The world has changed V... #X ::: [412] Eclipse V #X ::: [501] Tower Defense III #X ::: [562] Eclipse VI #X

Tutorial.Title: [004] Channelers Internal Clock #X
Tutorial.TutorialText:
EVENT ::: Channelers Internal Clock
HIDDEN ::: Yes
INFORMATION ::: Killing time. Some Channelers spells will become increasingly more powerful as time passes.
ORIGIN ::: Season 4 (1000000)
REWARD ::: A calculated Spell Potency increases by 1% per 4 Seasons (250% over 1000 Seasons).
SPECIAL ::: Bonus is only given to Cult Leaders with the Channeler Clock Champion Talent. ::: Bonus is only given to some Spells as indicated by the Time Bonus mention in the Hiergamenon.

Tutorial.Title: [051] Drilling Progress I #X
Tutorial.TutorialText:
EVENT ::: Drilling Progress I
HIDDEN ::: Yes
INFORMATION ::: Minimum Experience from Combat is now 8.
ORIGIN ::: Season 51 (1000000)
REWARD ::: Minimum Experience from Combat is now 8.
SPECIAL ::: N/A

Tutorial.Title: [052] Eclipse I #X
Tutorial.TutorialText:
EVENT ::: Eclipse I
HIDDEN ::: Yes
INFORMATION ::: All Wild Creatures gain 3 Levels.
ORIGIN ::: Season 52 (1000000)
REWARD ::: +3 Levels for Wild Creatures.
SPECIAL ::: Excludes Wildland Creatures.

Tutorial.Title: [054] The world has changed I... #X
Tutorial.TutorialText:
EVENT ::: The world has changed I...
HIDDEN ::: Yes
INFORMATION ::: Maximum Equipped Accessories is now 5.
ORIGIN ::: Season 54 (1000000)
REWARD ::: +1 Maximum Equipped Accessories.
SPECIAL ::: N/A

Tutorial.Title: [055] Monster Crusaders I #X
Tutorial.TutorialText:
EVENT ::: Monster Crusaders I
HIDDEN ::: Yes
INFORMATION ::: Maximum Creatures Move Limit increased to 3. ::: Allow Creatures to use up to 3 Movement Points, but does not increase Movement Points. ::: In other words, if a Creature has only 2 Movement Points, it can only use 2.
ORIGIN ::: Season 55 (1000000)
REWARD ::: +1 Creatures Move Limit.
SPECIAL ::: Might exclude Wildland Creatures (?).
